summary: I experimented in Rust with Key Derivation Functions (KDFs) used in Signal’s double ratchet protocol and this is what I learned. image by artist fiolisaviyMotivationI’m implementing a secure packet-based wireless messaging system because I think it will be an interesting learning experience.  I want the messages sent in the packets to be encrypted for confidentiality and for the packets themselves to be authenticated to detect message tampering...
title: Experimenting with Key Derivation Functions in Rust

summary: After a long battle with her health the past few years, my mother peacefully passed away today.  Even though my heart is broken, I’m relieved her long fight is over.  She was kept comfortable and cared for up to the very end...
